title: Vigilance: A Heroics Novel
description: "This is not good, guys." "New slogan for our team right there." "There is fire, AJ." "Even better." Time may have passed for Caotico City, but that doesn't mean everything has remained seemingly random murders are jeopardizing the city's trust in its superheroes, old enemies appear to be joining forces with new ones, and life has become even more complicated for the Heroics team. With their wounds still healing and the realization that sometimes the hardest challenges to overcome are human ones, even for superheroes, the now-adult members of Heroics face some of the toughest battles of their lives. Can they work together to restore order in Caotico City? Or will their unity finally crumble?
author: Alex Kost
